name: Cargotastrophe
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare jam 40.

Theme: "The more you have, the worse it is."

All assets created for the jam, except for the font.

Font is Audiowide, designed by Brian J. Bonislawsky for Astigmatic. Found on Google Fonts.
Open Font License: http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&id=OFL_web

Tools used:

Game Maker Studio 1.4

Serif Draw Plus X6

sfxr

Audacity
